page.discussion: The <TBL>.IS_DELETED() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the current record has been deleted.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script deletes the current record, then checks to see if its status is "Deleted".
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() tbl.change_begin() tbl.delete() tbl.change_end(.T.) status = tbl.is_deleted()
